refnamediv.refpurpose: Remote execution of SPARQL via SPARQL protocol, produces a result set of SQL values.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Remote execution of SPARQL via SPARQL protocol, produces a result set of SQL values.

refsect2.title: service
refsect2.para: service URI to call via HTTP.

refsect2.title: query
refsect2.para: text of SPARQL query to execute.

refsect2.title: dflt_graph
refsect2.para: default graph IRI, if not NULL then this overrides what is specified in query

refsect2.title: named_graphs
refsect2.para: vector of named graph IRIs, if not NULL then this overrides what is specified in query

refsect2.title: req_hdr
refsect2.para: additional HTTP header lines that should be passed to the service; 'Host: ...' is most popular.

refsect2.title: maxrows
refsect2.para: limit on numbers of rows that should be returned.

example.title: Simple Use
